PID.name: Ethnic Group
PID.notes: This field further defines the patient's ancestry. HL7 allows this field to repeat.

OBR.name: Specimen Action Code
OBR.notes: If G, then OBR-26 and OBR-29 should be populated!

OBR.name: Results Report/Status Change Date/Time
OBR.notes: Required for Epi OBR, where OBR-4[1].1 == 68991-9

xtraValidation.message: OBR-26 (Parent Result) cannot be NULL if OBR-11 (Specimen Action Code) has the value G
OBR-29 (Parent) cannot be NULL if OBR-11 (Specimen Action Code) has the value G

OBR.name: Reason for Study
OBR.notes: Required for Epi OBR, where OBR-4[1].1 == 68991-9

OBX.name: Value Type
OBX.notes: This field is Required, Unless OBX-11 is valued X

xtraValidation.message: If OBX-11 (Observation Result Status) has the value X, OBX-2 (Value Type) is required

SFT.name: software Certified Version or Release Number

PD1.name: Patient Primary Care Provider Name and ID no

NK1.name: Next of Kin/Assoc Parties Job Title
Next of Kin/Assoc Parties Job Code/Class
Next of Kin/ Assoc Parties Employee Number
